Name: 家园（Home Land）
About the game: In the game world of Home, your home (Fuzhou, Fujian Province) was once ravaged by the beasts of god. Although the destroyed home has been rebuilt, you still want to accumulate strength and blade those beasts of god, but you can't find the source of strength, so you have to look around all the time. Finally, one day you found a treasure house in Guling, East China by chance. Maybe there is something you need in it. Things. In the follow-up updates, I will enter the city of Fuzhou, experience some stories, and appreciate the flavor of Fuzhou.
